index.para1: Today, the t-shirt is an essential item of clothing in everyone's wardrobe. And in an area where the environmental question arises more than ever, we prefer t-shirts made in Quebec in order to reduce the environmental impact and highlight local craftsmanship.
index.para2: V-shaped t-shirt, round neck, loose or fitted, short-sleeved or long-sleeved for those who are more chilly, plain or patterned to stylize an outfit... The t-shirt is available in a variety of colors, styles and patterns.
